titles.title: Relationship Lending Preservation Act of 2017
Relationship Lending Preservation Act of 2017
A bill to require the Bureau of Consumer Financial Protection to amend its regulations relating to qualified mortgages, and for other purposes.
Relationship Lending Preservation Act of 2017

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs
